examples: Hello, I'm new here.
Hello, it's good to see you again.
Hello, I am the new student and my name is Sarah.
She said hello to me and I went weak in the knees.
Come and say hello.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we see someone and want to greet them, or when we begin to talk on the phone
words.defineVi: một từ chúng ta nói khi nhìn thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ, hoặc khi chúng ta bắt đầu nói chuyện điện thoại

examples: The passengers waved goodbye to their loved ones from the ship's deck.
Goodbye, take care of yourself.
Well, you can wave goodbye to your brand new car, mister!
Goodbye, I hope to see you again.
She waved goodbye and was off to catch her train.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving or someone is leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời đi hoặc ai đó đang rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: Hi, what is your name?
Hi, would you like to join us for lunch?
He introduced himself by saying, "Hi, my name is Alex."
Hi, nice to meet you.
Hi, here to buy your country.
words.defineEn: we say when we see someone and want to greet them
words.defineVi: chúng ta nói khi chúng ta thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ

examples: I see you later, bye!
Bye. Say bye.
Bye. Say bye.
Have a good one, bye.
Have a good one, bye.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving someone or when they are leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời khỏi ai đó hoặc khi họ rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: Good morning, it's a beautiful day today!
She didn't even take the time to wish me good morning.
Good morning your honors may please the court.
Say good morning.
Say good morning!
words.defineEn: something we say when we want to greet or say hello to someone in the morning
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi muốn chào hỏi hoặc chào ai đó vào buổi sáng

examples: Good afternoon, the weather is perfect for a walk.
Good afternoon, have you finished your work for today?
Good afternoon, I hope you're enjoying your day so far.
Thank you Miss Mitchell for Senator Crapo Good afternoon When we left off we were still talking about the polygraph
Good afternoon, Madoff ,Elizabeth speaking.
words.defineEn: something we say when we want to say hello or goodbye to a person in the afternoon
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi muốn nói lời chào hoặc tạm biệt với một người vào buổi chiều

examples: Good evening, it's getting dark outside.
Good evening, I hope you had a pleasant day.
Stephanie Sy has our update STEPHANIE SY: Good evening, Judy.
'Good evening, Commander,' they said.
Good evening, I'm Tina Fey.
words.defineEn: something we say when we want to say hello or goodbye to a person in the evening
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi muốn nói xin chào hoặc tạm biệt với một người vào buổi tối

examples: Good night, it's time to say goodbye to the day.
Good night, don't forget to brush your teeth before bed.
The hotel provided fluffy pillows for a good night's sleep.
She had a high level of energy after a good night's sleep.
After a good night's sleep, Emma woke up feeling right as rain, ready to tackle the day ahead.
words.defineEn: something we say when we want to say goodbye to a person at night or before we go to bed
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi muốn nói lời tạm biệt với một người vào ban đêm hoặc trước khi đi ngủ

examples: Thank you for putting in a word for me.
Thank you for choosing our restaurant.
Thank you so much for asking me.
Thank you so much for coming in for the interview.
Thank you all for attending this staff meeting.
words.defineEn: something we say to someone to show we are grateful to them for something that they have done for us or given us
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói với ai đó để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi biết ơn họ vì điều gì đó mà họ đã làm cho chúng tôi hoặc cho chúng tôi

examples: 'Thanks,' he answered.
Thanks Courtney for sending this out.
- Thanks, I thrifted it.
- Yeah. - Thanks, Wren, for sponsoring today's video.
- Thanks dudes, we'll see you tomorrow.
words.defineEn: said when someone helps us or does something nice for us
words.defineVi: nói khi ai đó giúp chúng tôi hoặc làm điều gì đó tốt đẹp cho chúng tôi

examples: Pass the salt, please.
Please make a note of the dates.
Close the door, please.
Can I have a Coke, please?
Please write your name on the paper.
words.defineEn: used when we want to politely ask for something or politely tell a person to do something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn lịch sự yêu cầu một cái gì đó hoặc lịch sự bảo một người làm điều gì đó

examples: OK, mum's the word!
OK, it’s a deal.
Ok, we can have pasta for dinner tonight.
OK, I'll do it -
OK, what happened at Blair's party last night?
words.defineEn: said to show that we are agreeing to do something or we agree with something
words.defineVi: nói để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi đang đồng ý làm điều gì đó hoặc chúng tôi đồng ý với điều gì đó

examples: Please say yes!
Oh yes, enough said.
Yes, I'm as snug as a bug in a rug.
Yes, he is my friend.
Yes, that's a great idea!
words.defineEn: a word that shows we agree with something or think that it is true when answering a question
words.defineVi: một từ cho thấy chúng tôi đồng ý với một cái gì đó hoặc nghĩ rằng đó là sự thật khi trả lời một câu hỏi

examples: Her answer is no.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Journalists on the spot reported no progress.
They mean no harm.
They mean no harm.
words.defineEn: used to give an answer to a question showing that we do not agree or it is not true
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đưa ra câu trả lời cho một câu hỏi cho thấy rằng chúng tôi không đồng ý hoặc nó không đúng

examples: "Sorry, I've run out."
Sorry, I'm still really groggy.
Sorry, what did you say?
Sorry, I don't follow.
Sorry, could you please hand me the book?
words.defineEn: a word we say to apologize for something or to say we are embarrassed
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói để xin lỗi cho một cái gì đó hoặc để nói rằng chúng tôi đang xấu hổ

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
Welcome to my world!
"You're welcome."
When all fruit fails, welcome haws.
A port in a storm is a welcome thing.
words.defineEn: a word that we use to greet someone when they arrive
words.defineVi: một từ mà chúng ta sử dụng để chào đón ai đó khi họ đến
